summary: Rain death upon your enemies with unrelenting barrages of catapult fire, fireballs and arrow storms. Simply mark your target with your Marker Arrows, use the Launch Barrage power and watch the chaos begin.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b]Artillery - Death From Afar[/b][/size][/center]

[center][size=5]Rain death upon your enemies with unrelenting barrages of catapult fire, fireballs and arrow storms. Simply mark your target with your Marker Arrows, use the \'Launch Barrage\' power and watch the chaos begin.[/size][/center]

[center]This mod aims to add numerous types of artillery to Skyrim whilst remaining as true to lore as possible. Current Artillery forms:[/center]
[list]
[*]Fire Storm - A concentrated rain of fireballs
[*]Ice Storm - A concentrated rain of ice shards
[*]Arrow Storm - A concentrated hail of arrows
[*]Catapult Strike - A barrage of explosives fired from a catapult
[*]Rock Barrage - A barrage of large rocks
[*]Marked For Death - Target an individual and an storm of arrows will be fired at the target, following them as they move.
[/list]

Equip them with your favorite bow, take aim at your target location and release. A smoke signal will appear where your arrow lands indicating to the waiting Catapult Engineers, Mages or Archers where to unleash hell, you will also be given the \'Launch Barrage\' power. Once you have set up some targets, use the \'Launch Barrage power and the artillery will begin. You can even set up several markers at the same time to increase the destruction.

You can find my workshop in game (South West of Morthal) complete with a delivery crate outside full of marker arrows, catapult and ballista Take a look around the place and read the journals for background on the Artillery and clues about future updates.

The marker arrows can also be purchased/found in the following locations:
[list]
[*]Arrow Storm: Imperial/Stormcloak Quartermasters, Blacksmiths in Solitude and Windhelm
[*]Fire Storm: Faralda in Winterhold
[*]Ice Storm: Faralda in Winterhold
[*]Catapult Strike: Imperial/Stormcloak Quartermasters
[*]Rock Barrage: Bandit Chiefs
[*]Marked for Death: Babbette in the Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary
[/list]

Alternatively you can find the codes for the weapons by typing the following into the console:
help \"marker arrow\"

If you have any suggestions, questions or issues then please let me know. Don\'t forget to rate and favorite if you enjoy it and check out my other Throwing Weapons Mods.

Featured in Skyrim Mod Series
[youtube]IfeujVhTg_8[/youtube]

Reviewed by MMOXReview
[youtube]jpaDggD8IQo[/youtube]

Featured in Mod of the Day
[youtube]nAR4JyhLlMY[/youtube]
author: Madrilous

files.name: Artillery - Death From Afar Version 1_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added Bandit Barrage
Change the Fire! power to Launch Barrage and added description
Increased the height the projectiles are launched from
Tweaked fire storm to be a more precise strike
Tweaked Catapult Strike to have a larger area of effect
Removed the arrows from the Riverwood Trader
Added the arrows to more appropriate locations.

files.name: Artillery - Death From Afar Version 1_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added Ice Storm and Marked For Death arrows
Added Madrilous\'s workshop, where the arrows can be found
Fixed Faralda not having the Marker Arrows
A few minor tweaks and changes.
